I'd like to revise the email to make it more concise and focused on the benefits of our solution for SingHealth. Here's a revised draft:

**Subject: Exploring AI-Powered Medical Imaging Solutions for SingHealth**

Dear Associate Professor Tan Cher Heng,

I'm [Your Name], [Your Title] of [Your Company], a leading provider of AI-powered medical imaging software solutions. I'm reaching out to explore how our solution can benefit SingHealth's Department of Diagnostic Radiology at Singapore General Hospital.

Our AI-powered medical imaging software can enhance the accuracy and speed of diagnosis, leading to better patient outcomes and reduced costs. We've seen promising results in [briefly mention any relevant case studies or success stories]. I believe our solution can be a valuable addition to your department's imaging capabilities.

I'll be attending the Healthcare Innovation Summit Asia 2023 and would like to discuss this further with you in person. Are you available to meet on:

* March 20, 2023
